name: Door_out
description:
DOOR OUT - 3D game designed for the 1st player.

  The essence of the game is to find key cards for secret doors , hatches, as well as for the exit.

  In this game there are elements of parkour, as well as elements of Sci-Fi graphics.

  Start the game and explore the halls and boxes. Do not miss anything interesting and important for further passage.

                                                                 Control

  • WASD = move
  • Shift = run
  • C = Sit down

                                                                Useful links

  • Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/_sasai._.kudasai_/
  • Full version(free) : https://www.gamearter.com/game/door-out
